Verses: 1 usiyaa Raajaa Maranamadaindha Varushaththil, Aandavar Uyaramum Unnadhamumaana Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkakkanden; Avarudaiya Vasthiraththongalaal Dhevaalayam Niraindhirundhadhu.

2 seraabeengal Avarukku Melaaga Nindraargal; Avargalil Ovvoruvanukkum Avvaaru Settaigalirundhana; Avanavan Irandu Settaigalaal Than Than Mugaththai Moodi, Irandu Settaigalaal Than Than Kaalgalai Moodi, Irandu Settaigalaal Parandhu;
3 oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Senaigalin Karththar Parisuththar, Parisuththar, Parisuththar, Boomiyanaiththum Avarudaiya Magimaiyaal Niraindhirukkiradhu Endru Kooppittu Sonnaargal.
4 kooppidugiravargalin Saththaththaal Vaasalgalin Nilaigal Asaindhu, Aalayam Pugaiyinaal Niraindhadhu.

5 appozhudhu Naan: Aiyo! Adhamaanen, Naan Asuththa Udhadugalulla Manushan, Asuththa Udhadugalulla Janangalin Naduvil Vaasamaayirukkiravan; Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Raajaavai En Kangal Kandadhe Endren.
6 appozhudhu Seraabeengalil Oruvan Palipeedaththilirundhu, Than Kaiyile Pidiththa Kurattaal Oru Nerupputh Thazhalai Eduththu, Ennidaththil Parandhu Vandhu,
7 adhinaal En Vaayaith Thottu: Idho, Idhu Un Udhadugalaith Thottadhinaal Un Akkiramam Neengi, Un Paavam Nivirththiyaanadhu Endraan.
8 pinbu Yaarai Naan Anuppuven, Yaar Namadhu Kaariyamaaip Povaan Endru Uraikkira Aandavarudaiya Saththaththaik Ketten. Adharku Naan: Idho, Adiyen Irukkiren; Ennai Anuppum Endren.
9 appozhudhu Avar: Nee Poi, Indha Janangalai Nokki: Neengal Kaadhaarak Kettum Unaraamalum, Kannaarakkandum Ariyaamalum Irungal Endru Sol.

10 indha Janangal Thangal Kangalinaal Kaanaamalum, Thangal Kaadhugalinaal Kelaamalum, Thangal Irudhayaththil Unarndhu Gunappadaamalum, Naan Avargalai Aarokkiyamaakkaamalumirukka, Nee Avargal Irudhayaththaik Kozhuththadhaakki, Avargal Kaadhugalai Mandhappaduththi, Avargal Kangalai Moodippodu Endraar.
11 appozhudhu Naan: Aandavare, Edhuvaraikkum Endru Ketten. Adharku Avar: Pattanangal Kudiyillaamalum, Veedugal Manushasanjaaramillaamalum Paazhaagi, Boomi Avaandharaveliyaagi,
12 karththar Manusharai Dhooramaaga Vilakkuvadhinaal, Dhesaththin Nadumaiyam Mutrilum Asaikkappadumvaraikkume.

13 aagilum Adhil Innum Paththiloru Pangirukkum, Adhuvum Thirumba Nirmoolamaakkappadum; Karvaalimaramum Arasamaramum Ilaiyatrupponapinbu, Avaigalin Adimaram Iruppadhupola, Adhin Adimaramum Parisuththa Viththaayirukkum Endraar.
